meanings.definition: A horse used for carrying goods on its back.
meanings.sent1: The packhorses carried heavy loads through the mountains.
meanings.sent2: The packhorses were essential for transporting supplies to the remote village.
meanings.sent3: The packhorses decided to go on strike until they got better treats.
meanings.sent4: The packhorses trudged along the trail like diligent workers.
meanings.sent5: The image of the packhorses laboring up the steep path stayed with him.

meanings.definition: A group of horses used for transporting goods.
meanings.sent1: The packhorses lined up in a row ready to begin their journey.
meanings.sent2: The merchants relied on the packhorses to deliver their goods to the market.
meanings.sent3: The packhorses had a race to see who could carry the most items without dropping any.
meanings.sent4: The packhorses moved in unison, a synchronized team of transporters.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the packhorses trotting together created a picturesque scene.
